ARCA.label: Archipelago Electronic Communications Network
ARCA.description: The Archipelago Electronic Communications Network (ARCX) allows the trading of listed NYSE, AMEX, NYSE Arca, and Nasdaq stocks in quantities from 1 to 1,000,000.

BATS.label: BATS Global Markets
BATS.description: In the United States Bats operates two stock exchanges, the BZX Exchange and the BYX Exchange (The Bats Exchanges), which as of 2012 accounted for about 10-12% of all U.S. equity trading on a daily basis.

NASDAQ.description: NASDAQ is an American/Canadian stock exchange. It is the second-largest exchange in the world by market capitalization, behind only the New York Stock Exchange.
NASDAQ.label: NASDAQ - All Markets

NYSE.description: The New York Stock Exchange, sometimes known as the "Big Board", is a stock exchange located in New York. It is by far the world's largest stock exchange by market capitalization
NYSE.label: New York Stock Exchange

AMEX.description: NYSE MKT LLC, formerly known as the American Stock Exchange (AMEX), is an American stock exchange situated in New York City, New York. AMEX was previously a mutual organization, owned by its members. Until 1953, it was known as the New York Curb Exchange.
AMEX.label: NYSE MKT LLC

TSX.label: Toronto Stock Exchange
TSX.description: The Toronto Stock Exchange is the largest stock exchange in Canada, the third largest in North America and the seventh largest in the world by market capitalization. Based in Toronto, it is owned by and operated as a subsidiary of the TMX Group for the trading of senior equities.

TSXV.description: The TSX Venture Exchange is a stock exchange in Canada. It is headquartered in Calgary, Alberta and has offices in Toronto, Vancouver, and Montreal.
TSXV.label: TSX Venture Exchange

CAD.description: Forex Capital Markets trading using CAD as the quote currency.

LSE.description: The London Stock Exchange (LSE) is a stock exchange located in the City of London in the United Kingdom and the third-largest stock exchange in the world.
LSE.label: London Stock Exchange
